questionTitle: Which of the following is one of the unique attributes of Cloud Computing?
questionExplanation: These attributes change how applications are created, priced, and delivered.

questionOption1: Service Level Agreements (SLAs) is small aspect of cloud computing
questionOption2: Cloud computing does not have impact on software licensing
questionOption3: Cloud computing presents new opportunities to users and developers
questionExplanation: Because it is based on the paradigm of a shared multi-tenant utility.

questionTitle: Applications that work with cloud computing that have low margins and usually low risk are _____________
questionExplanation: The “high touch” applications that come with high margins require committed resources and pose more of a risk.

questionTitle: A service that concentrates on hardware follows the _________ as a Service model.
questionExplanation: Amazon web service follows PaaS model.

questionOption1: A cloud is defined as the combination of the infrastructure of a datacenter with the ability to provision hardware and software
questionOption2: High touch applications are best done on-premises
questionOption3: The Google App Engine follows IaaS
questionExplanation: The Google App Engine follows PaaS.

questionTitle: When you add a software stack, such as an operating system and applications to the service, the model shifts to _____ model.
questionExplanation: Microsoft’s Windows Azure Platform is best described as currently using SaaS model.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most refined and restrictive service model?
questionExplanation: When the service requires the client to use a complete hardware/software/application stack, it is using the most refined and restrictive service model.

questionTitle: _______ is a pay-as-you-go model matches resources to need on an ongoing basis.
questionExplanation: This eliminates waste and has the added benefit of shifting risk from the client.

questionTitle: _______ feature allows you to optimize your system and capture all possible transactions.
questionExplanation: You have the ability to right-size resources as required.

questionTitle: _______ enables batch processing, which greatly speeds up high-processing applications.
questionExplanation: This feature obviates the need for planning and provisioning.
